hadiths.text: Narrated Qatadah: When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) saw the new moon, he turned away his face from it. Abu Dawud said: On this subject there is no tradition which has perfect chain and is sound

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ الرَّجُلُ إِذَا رَأَى الْهِلاَلَ
chapter.eng-name: What a man should say when he sees the new crescent
